title: Hypoglycemia Risk Score
desc: The Hypoglycemia Risk Score predicts 12-month risk of hypoglycemic episodes in T2DM patients.

orgreference.text: Karter AJ, Warton EM, Lipska KJ, et al. Development and Validation of a Tool to Identify Patients With Type 2 Diabetes at High Risk of Hypoglycemia-Related Emergency Department or Hospital Use. JAMA Intern Med. 2017;177(10):1461-1470.
